text: @HKrassenstein Remember this...the covid19 came from China,most likely out of a lab. The Democrats are defending CHINA! DISGRACE!! They will do anything to destroy our President even holding back money for the American citizens! Pelosi is a disgrace,  Dems are a disgrace!
